LanguageData.AteLavishLunchboxMeal.label: ate lavish lunchbox meal
LanguageData.AteLavishLunchboxMeal.description: That lavish lunchbox meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
LanguageData.AteLunchboxCasing.label: ate whole lavish lunchbox casing
LanguageData.AteLunchboxCasing.description: That lavish lunchbox casing is not meant for eating... WHY did I eat it?
